short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right-click to check CSS property parity between browsers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rather than opening new tab and searching for specific rule support on caniuse.com, just right-click on selected text and let the extension search for you!
